name: Axe Kick
description:
This page provides details on the martial arts axe kick. This kick can be used during sparring, breaking techniques, self-defense, etc. An axe kick is often used by martial artists to target an opponent’s head, clavicle, etc. This kicking technique is used in many martial arts such as Karate, Taekwondo, etc. For information on other martial arts kicks (i.e. spinning hook kick), please visit Black Belt Wiki’s main Martial Arts Kicking Techniques section.

Martial arts kicks and all other martial arts techniques should only be practiced under the supervision of a trained martial arts instructor in order to prevent injuries and to ensure the proper technique is utilized. In addition, all martial arts techniques and training should be used safely and responsibly.

How To Do A Martial Arts Axe Kick
